summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to surveillance cameras in police squad cars; directing the Seattle Police Department to purchase thirty (30) video surveillance cameras, install them in thirty (30) squad cars, and operate the video cameras for the purpose of monitoring activities within the view of those cameras; reducing an appropriation in the 2002 budget of the Office of Policy and Management and reappropriating that money to the Seattle Police Department to purchase the aforementioned video surveillance cameras.
